test_cases.title: Verify cart displays items correctly
test_cases.preconditions: User has added items to cart, user is on cart page
test_cases.test_steps:
1. View shopping cart page
2. Check displayed items
3. Verify quantities and prices
test_cases.expected_result: All cart items displayed with correct quantities, prices, and subtotal

test_cases.title: Verify item removal from cart
test_cases.preconditions: User has items in cart, user is on cart page
test_cases.test_steps:
1. Click remove button next to an item
2. Confirm removal if prompted
3. Check cart updates
test_cases.expected_result: Item is removed from cart, subtotal updates, confirmation message shown

test_cases.title: Verify valid credit card payment
test_cases.preconditions: User at checkout, items in cart, credit card selected
test_cases.test_steps:
1. Enter valid credit card details
2. Submit payment
3. Wait for processing
test_cases.expected_result: Payment processes successfully, order confirmation displayed

test_cases.title: Verify invalid credit card error handling
test_cases.preconditions: User at checkout, items in cart, credit card selected
test_cases.test_steps:
1. Enter invalid credit card number
2. Submit payment
3. Observe error handling
test_cases.expected_result: Clear error message displayed, payment not processed, user can correct information

test_cases.title: Verify payment gateway timeout handling
test_cases.preconditions: User at checkout, items in cart, credit card selected
test_cases.test_steps:
1. Simulate payment gateway timeout
2. Submit payment
3. Observe system behavior
test_cases.expected_result: User sees timeout message, can retry payment, no duplicate charges

test_cases.title: Verify order confirmation page
test_cases.test_steps:
1. Complete checkout process
2. View order confirmation page
3. Verify information displayed
test_cases.expected_result: Order confirmation shows order number, items, total, shipping address

test_cases.title: Verify confirmation email delivery
test_cases.preconditions: User completed purchase with valid email
test_cases.test_steps:
1. Complete checkout
2. Check email inbox
3. Open confirmation email
test_cases.expected_result: Confirmation email received within 5 minutes with correct order details
